name: Mighty Brawlers - Retro multiplayer platform mayhem.
blurb: The most massive multiplayer online, shoot-em up, epic smack down, to ever exist. We refer to it as our M.M.M.O.S.U.E.S.D. Evar!

rewards.reward:
Pre-Launch Brawling Mayhem
==============================
Before Mighty Brawlers is publicly released we will give you an exclusive invite to join us in the fray. There will be a Brawling party where we turn it all on and jump in the game with all our supporters a few days before launch. Everyone will be able use the early time to get some Brawler upgrades or just to brag that you are special. Because you are.
==============================
Kickstarter - Brawler Pack
==============================
A playable set of KickStarter Brawlers. We will pixel craft the founders of this awesome site and let you start pwning as them in game. This pack will only be available from this campaign.
OUYA - Brawler Pack\r\n==============================\r\nAll of the rewards above, plus... Ouya founders as playable Brawlers. Oh the goodness!

Gamestickr\u2122 - Pwning with Precision\r\n==============================\r\nAll of the rewards above, plus... Two sets of gamestickr\u2122 adhesives. One for yourself and a friend. http://gamestickr.com
Voting Rights\r\n==============================\r\nAll of the rewards above, plus... You will also be invited to vote on pre-release packs of Brawlers and their weapons.

Weekly Feature Brawler Pack\r\n==============================\r\nAll of the non-limited rewards above, plus... We will be releasing a weekly feature Brawler pack after launch. This will be a set of new Brawlers, with weapons, each week. This pledge amount will get you first access, at no cost, for the first year of the game. That's 52 packs!

Suggestion Box\r\n==============================\r\nAll of the rewards above, plus... Get access to our suggestion box to help us extend our list of Brawlers and Weapons. We will hand over our skype contact info for you to contact us anytime you want to pitch a new feature, Brawler or weapon!

Early Beta Tester & Mighty Brawlers T-Shirt\r\n==============================\r\nAll of the non-limited rewards above, plus...  Get access to the first private beta! Play along with the developers and be in style with your new shirt as you pwn.

Demigod Brawler Pack\r\n==============================\r\nAll of the non-limited rewards above, plus... Access to a very exclusive Brawler set. There will be no other Brawler pack that will pwn as these. Faster, Stronger, Better. Pwnage is Guaranteed.

Personal Brawler\r\n==============================\r\nAll of the rewards above, plus...  Send us a pic and we will craft a Brawler just for you. It can be anything you like; yourself, a monster, or a toaster. You will get a redeem code just for yourself to play as your Brawler in the game! Share the code or keep it private, it's up to you.

Developer Level Access\r\n==============================\r\nAll of the rewards above, plus... We hand over the tools to help us build our game. You will receive one copy of our editor. It allows you to build Brawlers, weapons, and worlds. Of course we will need to approve any creations before we push them into the game, but we will work closely with you to bring your creations to life!

Brawler of Legend
============================== All of the rewards above, plus... Get a Brawler of Legend. This Brawler will be heralded across the land. Tales of their strength and fortitude will be part of song and dance. No really, the Brawler will be unstoppable. ==============================
Part of the Family
==============================
We will include you on our inner workings and feature planning. Help us plan, design, test, and discuss what is going to make Mighty Brawlers amazing. This is everything short of being an actual team member.
==============================
Developer Tools
==============================
We will ensure that you have everything you need to  help us craft Mighty Brawlers. We can send you an OUYA, and our custom MB Editor to work with.
